titleStmt.title: Gods blessing in blasting, and his mercy in mildew Tvvo sermons sutable to these times of dearth: by Iames Rowlandson B. in D. and pastor at East-Tysted in Hampshire.
titleStmt.author: Rowlandson, James, 1576 or 7-1639.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for William Bladen, at the great north doore of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
